feed.title: Last Mountain Lake (Sanctuary) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Last Mountain Lake (Sanctuary)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:52 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Last Mountain 04:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Temperature: -11.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -13.5°C
Wind: WNW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
